snippet: To the losers go the best draft picks, and in May the N.F.L.’s worst teams will see a handful of top quarterbacks on the board.
lead_paragraph: To the losers go the best draft picks, and in May the N.F.L.’s worst teams will see a handful of top quarterbacks on the board.

headline.main: At Bottom of N.F.L., a Draft to Ponder
headline.print_headline: At Bottom Of N.F.L., A Draft To Ponder
